为什么欧洲的预期寿命会停滞不前，以及一些国家如何保持领先地位2011年之后，欧洲预期寿命的增长放缓，共同19日大流行进一步加速下降，而一些国家通过持续的公共卫生政策保持了进步。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250225/why-life-expectancy-gains-gains-gains-in-europe-stallede28094and-and-how-how-some-countries-stayed-ahead.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250225/why-life-expectancy-gains-gains-gains-in-europe-stallede28094and-and-how-how-some-countries-some-countries-stay-ahead-ahead.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=aba4a8f2-17fe-4C65-945B-C051FCE9D7D4 Tue, 25 Feb 2025 19:36:00 -0500 Why life expectancy gains in Europe stalled—and how some countries stayed ahead
咖啡可以推回帕金森氏症吗？新研究发现关键的遗传联系根据孟德尔随机研究，较高的咖啡消费与帕金森氏病的延迟发作有关，但不会影响疾病的风险或进展。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250225/can-coffee-push-back-parkinsone28099s-new-study-uncovers-key-key-genetic-genetic-genetic-link.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250225/can-coffee-push-back-parkinsone28099s-new-study-uncovers-uncovers-key-genetic-genetic-genetic-genetic-link.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=63cc9fea-e37d-4f25-4f25-9107-a90c1fa1a769 Tue, 25 Feb 2025 18:57:00 -0500 Can coffee push back Parkinson’s? New study uncovers key genetic link

乳腺癌病例和死亡将到2050年激增 - 我们准备好了吗？一项全球研究发现，到2050年，乳腺癌病例将增加38％，死亡人数增加68％，在澳大利亚和新西兰发病率最高，并且在低收入国家的死亡率恶化。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250225/breast-cancer-casser-cases-and-deaths-set-set-to-surge-by-2050e28094are-we-prepared.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250225/breast-cancer-casser-cases-and-deaths-set-to-surge-by-2050e28094are-we-prepared.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=844463cc2-d2ED-4A34-8207-C9F573BC8E2C Tue, 25 Feb 2025 18:04:00 -0500 Breast cancer cases and deaths set to surge by 2050—are we prepared?
